comment: She is absolutely the GOAT!! Took her for english 1102 and wow. She is very sweet and cares about her students! You only have one major paper at the end and little assignments along the way to build up to the major final paper! Would recommend and retake again :)

Ms. Gehring's ENGL 1102 class is the golden standard for english composition classes.
She's a caring teacher that gives opportunities for success whilst pushing her students to challenge themselves. Your only test grades will just be 3 essays. Put in the work, you'll easily get an A in this class.

Loved this class! I am usually not great in English classes but she was so kind and made it easy to learn. I did the partially online class and the online assignments were really easy. There are graded group activities in class so it is definitely recommended to show up but they aren't hard either. She also grades easy so turn in what you can.
I liked the class. Shes super nice and cancels class sometimes lol.

Professor Gehring was amazing. She was kind and helpful and my only teacher who regularly responded to my emails. She wasn't a quick grader, but that is irrelevant considering she gave great feedback that genuinely improved my writing. There were a lot of group activities in class that I didn't love, but that is my only critique.
rating_tags: Group projects--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: She was extremely caring for all students and always gave good feedback in case we needed help. I had multiple accidents happen and asked for an extension towards my final paper, and she gave me a month! You'll have a discussion post due every week, just keep up with those, attend class, finish your papers, and you'll have an easy A.
AMAZING! Always there to help, very understanding, and just genuinely a fun person to be around. Take her!

This is a great class, I would Seriously consider taking this class, This professor is super nice and Gives very few Total assignments, Just make sure u do all the Discussion Posts. Theres very few Essays to write and She is very Easy on what topics u can write about as well. Highly recommend

AMAZING! easiest and best english class i've ever taken. Show up to class we always have group graded assignments but they help. Genuinely take her over any other 1102 teacher. She is so sweet and understanding, genuinely the best professor ever.

she is nice but she grades stuff  last minute and your work might not be completely graded. Also there is a lot of group work and in class activities, so try not to skip class. She also cancels class a lot so be sure to check your email.

TAKE HER! Mrs. Gehring is the most amazing professor . She is SO sweet to everyone, there is only 1 paper the ENTIRE semester (other checkpoint assignments leading up to it) and she grades it very easily. There are weekly discussion boards but they are super easy and take only like 5-10 minutes. She is so genuine and seems to love her job.
The professor was very clear when it came to assignments, she was also very understanding when it came to missing class or submitting late . I loved her !
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Take her! The best English teacher I've ever had. Everything taught actually made a difference in my writing. Super understanding and friendly. Very clear on expectations and gives plenty of time to write papers. I would choose her for every English class if possible! Could literally list her positives for days.
Very kind and one of my favorites. Very good to take her for first year students.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: she is plainly the best. she understands you might not always attend the lecture very approachable, and gives extra credit for going to the writing center for easy and well-explained assignments. good. she also encourages you to resend the email if you haven't gotten a reply in  2 days. I could go on and on.

She is really, really amazing. For every assignment, she gives clear instruction. She's very understanding when I need accommodation, which means the world to me. She's personable, the class is enjoyable, and I'm so happy to be taking her. The assignments are clear-cut, and if you need help, she responds very quickly. I recommend her so much. :)
Great teacher! Really interesting but not an extremely easy class. Make sure you are there beacuse attendance is mandatory. Overall great class!

One of the most influential professors in my college career.  She knows what she's doing and teachers from a non traditional style.  Loved her class and how interesting she made it.  This is a class that you will model your future professors after.

Great teacher. Love the way she runs her class. Gives very clear instructions on each paper and gives plenty of time to complete them. Class activities are a few (rare) grammar or writing notes then an activity regarding what she went over, then she dismisses class. Wonderful teacher. Excellent class.

I really enjoyed Mrs. Gehring's class. She picked a really interesting book which the class was based upon. Definitely learned a lot about the topic of the book. There are 4 papers and 3 response essays about the book. She does daily grades which are about the book, so make sure you read! She is a fair grader, gives great feedback. TAKE HER!
Young and relatable! Awesome teacher. She couldnt be more clear with her assignments. Do your homework and you shoudl be fine.
Very good teacher. Young and relatable. She couldnt be more clear with her assignments. Do hw and go to the wrting center and you should be fine!

Very laid back and down to Earth teacher. She was young and very approachable. Beyond that, she was clear with all of her assignments and her class was enjoyable. She had a daily writing grade, but it was always reasonable. My favorite class so far.
Awesome teacher! Loved her class.
